input.sentences: the parade was a beautiful testament to their culture .
the beautys rode in the car .
output.sentences: There was festival in the streets.
Everywhere I looked, there were beautiful women dressed for the occasion riding around in cars.
People were displaying homemade signs as I continued down the road.
Not only were the people outfitted for the festival, their cars were as well.
Towards the end of the festival, many people were heading back home to prepare for tonight's celebration.
